title: snowflake.core.stage.AzureCredentials | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: A model object representing the AzureCredentials resource.
Constructs an object of type AzureCredentials with the provided properties.
azure_sas_token (str, optional) – Specifies the SAS (shared access signature) token for connecting to Azure.
Create a new model by parsing and validating input data from keyword arguments.

Raises [ValidationError][pydantic_core.ValidationError] if the input data cannot be
validated to form a valid model.
self is explicitly positional-only to allow self as a field name.

Create an instance of AzureCredentials from a JSON string.
